name: F4110U7
description:
Sci-fi dungeon crawler inspired by Fallout world and gameplay.

#LOWREZJAM 2018

Gameplay

Explore abandoned asteroid research station.

Destroy several types of enemies (with different abilities and weaknesses) in a minimalistic combat system. Use 11 items and weapons to make combat somewhat tactical. Discover logs of previous investigator and finally discover what happened with research station on asteroid F.08/05.

Items and weapons description is available using the inventory button, monster abilities description have to be learnt in a hard way.

Controls

Explore map with keyboard arrows, fight and use items using onscreen buttons.

Credits
  • Graphics - 08-n7r6-79.84
  • Progamming - kipar
  • Music - Chromastranger
